Lady Gaga Tunda Konser Akibat Infeksi Sinus dan Bronkitis
07 Nov 2019, 14:03 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Lady Gaga mengumumkan terpaksa membatalkan konser residensinya di Las Vegas karena sakit infeksi sinus dan bronkitis. (AFP PHOTO / VALERIE MACON)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Lady Gaga mengumumkan menunda pertunjukan konser residensinya, Enigma, di Park Theater MGM Las Vegas pada Rabu (6/11) malam waktu setempat. Ia mengatakan terpaksa membatalkan konser itu karena sakit."Saya sangat kecewa tidak bisa tampil malam ini karena begitu banyak orang yang pergi jauh untuk melihat saya," kata Gaga dalam unggahan foto di media sosialnya.Foto tersebut menunjukkan Gaga sedang bersandar di sofa dengan alat bantu terpasang di mulutnya. Gaga tampak menutupi wajah dengan tangannya."Saya kena infeksi sinus dan bronkitis dan merasa amat sakit dan sedih, saya tak pernah ingin membuat kalian kecewa," lanjutnya."Saya hanya lelah dan terlalu [sakit] untuk tampil malam ini. Saya mencintai kalian semua Little Monster [fan Lady Gaga] saya berjanji akan menebusnya untuk kalian. Saya berjanji," katanya.



Pengumuman ini datang dua pekan dari kejadian Lady Gaga jatuh dari panggung setelah dia melompat ke pelukan seorang penggemar bernama Jack.Para penonton yang terkejut membantu untuk bangkit dan dia dengan cepat kembali ke panggung, serta melanjutkan penampilannya.Dalam video yang direkam oleh penonton konser, penyanyi Poker Face tersebut memberi tahu Jack bahwa insiden itu bukan kesalahannya."Jika ada orang di internet yang besok bersikap jahat padamu tentang hal ini, maka aku akan sangat kesal dengan mereka," katanya.Tak lama setelah itu, pelantun Bad Romance itu mengungkapkan bahwa dia menjalani pemeriksaan dengan X-Ray pada hampir seluruh tubuhnya."Ketika mereka harus melakukan X-Ray hampir di seluruh tubuhmu," tulis penyanyi berusia 33 tahun itu di media sosial, sehari setelah insiden.Dia kemudian menambahkan pernyataan untuk meyakinkan penggemar bahwa semuanya baik-baik saja.




(end)

Lady Gaga Postpones Concert Due to Sinus and Bronchitis Infection
Nov 7 2019, 14:03 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Lady Gaga announced she was forced to cancel her residency concert in Las Vegas due to a sinus infection and bronchitis. (AFP PHOTO / VALERIE MACON)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Lady Gaga announced the postponement of her residency concert, Enigma, at the MGM Las Vegas Park Theater on Wednesday (6/11) evening local time. He said he was forced to cancel the concert because of illness. "I am very disappointed not to be able to perform tonight because so many people have gone far to see me," Gaga said in an upload photo on social media. mounted in his mouth. Gaga seemed to cover her face with her hands. "I have a sinus infection and bronchitis and feel very sick and sad, I never want to make you disappointed," he continued. "I am just tired and too [sick] to perform tonight. I love you all "Little Monster [Lady Gaga fan] I promised I would make it up for you. I promised," he said.



This announcement came two weeks from the incident Lady Gaga fell off the stage after she jumped into the arms of a fan named Jack. The shocked audience helped to get up and she quickly returned to the stage, and continued her performance. In the video recorded by concert goers, the singer The Poker Face told Jack that the incident was not his fault. "If there are people on the internet who are being mean to you tomorrow about this, then I will be very upset with them," he said. Not long after that, the singer of Bad Romance revealed that he undergo an X-Ray examination on almost his entire body. "When they have to do an X-Ray almost all over your body," the 33-year-old singer wrote on social media, the day after the incident. He then added a statement to reassure fans that all was well. fine.
